main event: Two large red objects were reported seen by several reliable witnesses landing or descending near Boise, Idaho.
interesting points: The objects were reported to be hovering above the ground and then gradually moving downward with flames shooting downward.
The landing area was reported to be around 10-12 miles northwest of Boise.
The sheriff's department and others were going to investigate the landing area in the morning.
It was later determined that the sighting was actually of a 20,000 candle power flare being set off by a man and his son, explaining the UFO report.
The UFO investigation was dropped once the flare explanation was provided.
